name: Xerion
description:
[This game was made in 48 hours for Discord Jam #7]

INTRODUCTION:

A temple sits in the middle of the desert. Inside it is the truth you seek.

But to open the gate you need to pass the sphinx's puzzle. Slide the pieces until you reach a state of balance. The only rules are written in the form of a riddle:

WATERS EXTINGUISH THE FLAME;
THE WINDS KEEP IT ABLAZE;
DIRT AND WATER SHALL SUSTAIN
THE LEAVES THE FIRE SLAYS;
ANIMAL NEEDS DRINK AND FOOD;
YET TO ALL DEATH MAY COME;
WHEN THE BALANCE IS SECURED
MAY THE GATE BE OVERCOME.

CONTROLS:

Left Mouse Button - everything

CREDITS:

  • Programming, Art, SFX and Design: Mateus Boga
  • Music: Ashot-Danielyan-Composer from Pixabay
